title: Dirty Boys
description: PHOTO DESCRIPTION: A young man is trimming his hedges wearing only a pair of dirty jeans showing off his muscular body.STORY LETTER: Dear Author,I saw this guy every Saturday last spring and summer during my routine trash pickup route in his neighborhood. I could never find the courage to speak to him. I feel like something keeps pulling me towards him. How can I approach him? What will he think of me﻿… a garbage man?Sincerely,GinaSTORY INFO: Genre: contemporaryTags: lust, mutual masturbation, striptease, light and fluffy, blue-collarContent warnings: It’s dirty.Word count: 5,135This story was written as a part of the M/M Romance Group's 'Love Has No Boundaries event.
author: Kyle Adams
